thread.section_title: Comfort Inn Times Square West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for the complete theatre experience
thread.title_full: Perfect for the complete theatre experience - Review of Comfort Inn Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sandro E
title: Perfect for the complete theatre experience
text: Our stay was due to an university excursion under the theme of immersive theatre and we couldn't have hoped for a hotel more central. The service was also very good and the breakfast included something for everyone.
